abstract: Study published in journal The Annals of Neurology finds stress of living in neonatal intensive care unit negatively affects brain development of extremely premature infants. Study's senior author is Dr Terrie Inder of Washington University in St Louis.
snippet: A small study suggests that the stress of living in a neonatal intensive care unit affected the brain development of extremely premature infants.
lead_paragraph: A small study suggests that the stress of living in a neonatal intensive care unit affected the brain development of extremely premature infants.

headline.main: Risks: Stress May Harm Preemies’ Development
headline.print_headline: Risks: Stress May Harm Preemies’ Development
headline.seo: Stress Harms Development of Premature Babies, Study Finds
